## ant-design

The current template is based on [ant-design] (https://ant.design/), the chart component mainly uses [https://charts.ant.design] (https://charts.ant.design/), and the rest of the components and icon parts are completed independently by the ant component

### Workbench example

<div className="template-figure">
  <Image src={AntDesign1} alt="Workbench" loading="eager"  />
  <Image src={AntDesign1Dark} alt="Workbench Dark" loading="eager"  />
</div>


### Multidimensional data analytics example

<div className="template-figure">
  <Image src={AntDesign2} alt="Multidimensional data analytics" loading="eager"  />
  <Image src={AntDesign2Dark} alt="Multidimensional data analytics Dark" loading="eager"  />
</div>

<div className="template-figure">
